text:
But you're getting the picture right?

Acts dimwitted on telly (i.e., lies about taking #chloroquine) & all the while he's pulling moves like this. 

You do get the picture I hope. 

We're kinda past the flouting norms bit.

#HeadlinesMatter @nytimes

Headlines he deserves? 200k? https://t.co/txhXk98khl
